snippet: The Container Store has begun to hire advisers to prepare for a potential initial public offering, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday, nearly five years after selling itself to the private equity firm Leonard Green & Partners.
abstract: The Container Store has begun to hire advisers to prepare for a potential initial public offering, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday, nearly five years after selling itself to the private equity firm Leonard Green & Partners.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Container Store Said to Prepare for an I.P.O.
